GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

PRIMARY_CUST_NAME.title: Primary Customer Name
PRIMARY_CUST_NAME.instruction:
Write the full legal name of the first applicant. 
Example: 'RAJESH KUMAR SHARMA'
rejections: Name does not match ID proof

PRIMARY_CUST_ID.title: Primary Customer ID
PRIMARY_CUST_ID.instruction:
Enter the unique Customer ID assigned to the primary applicant by the bank. 
Example: '12345678'

LOCKER_NO.title: Locker Number
LOCKER_NO.instruction:
Enter the specific locker number assigned to you. 
Example: 'A-104' or '12B'

LOCKER_SIZE.title: Locker Size
LOCKER_SIZE.instruction:
Specify the size of the locker you are hiring. 
Examples: 'Small', 'Medium', 'Large', 'Extra Large'

LOCKER_KEY_NO.title: Locker Key Number
LOCKER_KEY_NO.instruction:
Enter the specific number engraved on the locker key provided to you. 
Example: 'KEY-998'

RENT_RECOVERY_ACC_NO.title: Rent Recovery Account Number
RENT_RECOVERY_ACC_NO.instruction:
Enter the bank account number from which the annual rent will be automatically deducted. 
Example: '100050009000'

RENT_RECOVERY_NAME.title: Rent Recovery Account Holder Name
RENT_RECOVERY_NAME.instruction:
Write the name of the person who holds the rent recovery account. 
Example: 'RAJESH KUMAR SHARMA'

MODE_OF_OPERATION_E_S.title: Mode: Either or Survivor
MODE_OF_OPERATION_E_S.instruction: Tick this box if any one of the holders can operate the locker independently, and upon death, the survivor gets access.

MODE_OF_OPERATION_F_S.title: Mode: Former or Survivor
MODE_OF_OPERATION_F_S.instruction: Tick this box if ONLY the first holder can operate it during their lifetime. The second holder gets access only after the first holder's death.

MODE_OF_OPERATION_JOINT.title: Mode: Jointly
MODE_OF_OPERATION_JOINT.instruction: Tick this box if ALL holders must be present together to open the locker.

MODE_OF_OPERATION_ANY_S.title: Mode: Anyone or Survivor
MODE_OF_OPERATION_ANY_S.instruction: Tick this box if there are more than two holders, and any one of them can operate it independently.

AGREEMENT_RENT_AMT.title: Annual Rent Amount
AGREEMENT_RENT_AMT.instruction:
Enter the yearly rent amount in Rupees. 
Example: '3500/-'

NOMINATION_OPT_YES.title: Nomination: Yes
NOMINATION_OPT_YES.instruction: Tick this box if you want to appoint a nominee to receive the contents after death.

NOMINATION_OPT_NO.title: Nomination: No
NOMINATION_OPT_NO.instruction: Tick this box if you DO NOT want to appoint a nominee right now.

NOMINEE_1_NAME.title: Nominee 1 Name
NOMINEE_1_NAME.instruction:
If Nomination is 'Yes', write the full name of the first nominee. 
Example: 'SUNITA SHARMA'
rejections: Nomination is Yes but name missing

NOMINEE_1_RELATION.title: Nominee 1 Relationship
NOMINEE_1_RELATION.instruction:
Write how Nominee 1 is related to you. 
Examples: 'Spouse', 'Son', 'Mother'

NOMINEE_1_DOB.title: Nominee 1 DOB
NOMINEE_1_DOB.instruction: Enter the Date of Birth of Nominee 1 (DD-MM-YYYY).

NOMINEE_1_ADDRESS.title: Nominee 1 Address
NOMINEE_1_ADDRESS.instruction: Write the full address of Nominee 1.

NOMINEE_1_GUARDIAN.title: Guardian for Nominee 1 (If Minor)
NOMINEE_1_GUARDIAN.instruction: If Nominee 1 is under 18, write the Name and Address of their Guardian here.
rejections: Nominee is minor but Guardian details missing

NOMINEE_2_NAME.title: Nominee 2 Name
NOMINEE_2_NAME.instruction: Fill this ONLY if you have a second nominee (for joint accounts).

WITNESS_1_DETAILS.title: Witness 1 Name & Address
WITNESS_1_DETAILS.instruction: Required ONLY if you use a Thumb Impression. Enter Witness 1's Name and Address.
rejections: Thumb impression used but Witness 1 missing

WITNESS_2_DETAILS.title: Witness 2 Name & Address
WITNESS_2_DETAILS.instruction: Required ONLY if you use a Thumb Impression. Enter Witness 2's Name and Address.
rejections: Thumb impression used but Witness 2 missing

SIGNATURE_1_PHOTO.title: 1st Holder Photograph
SIGNATURE_1_PHOTO.instruction: Paste a recent colour photograph of the 1st Applicant here.

SIGNATURE_1_SIGN.title: 1st Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_1_SIGN.instruction: Sign ACROSS the photograph and in the designated box below it.

SIGNATURE_2_PHOTO.title: 2nd Holder Photograph
SIGNATURE_2_PHOTO.instruction: Paste a recent colour photograph of the 2nd Applicant (if applicable).
rejections: Joint account selected but 2nd photo missing

SIGNATURE_2_SIGN.title: 2nd Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_2_SIGN.instruction: The 2nd Applicant must sign across their photograph and in the box below.
rejections: Joint account selected but 2nd signature missing

SIGNATURE_3_PHOTO.title: 3rd Holder Photograph
SIGNATURE_3_PHOTO.instruction: Paste a recent colour photograph of the 3rd Applicant (if applicable).

SIGNATURE_3_SIGN.title: 3rd Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_3_SIGN.instruction: The 3rd Applicant must sign across their photograph and in the box below.

OFFICE_USE_CABINET_ID.title: Cabinet ID (Bank Use)
OFFICE_USE_CABINET_ID.instruction:
Bank Official Use Only: Enter the Cabinet ID where the locker is located. 
Example: 'CAB-05'

OFFICE_USE_MASTER_KEY.title: Master Key ID (Bank Use)
OFFICE_USE_MASTER_KEY.instruction:
Bank Official Use Only: Enter the Master Key ID. 
Example: 'MK-101'
